definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: And the Northwest Passage in the Arctic became ice-free for the first time in living memory.
sentences.chinese: 在当今人们的记中，北极西北航道首次成为无冰航道。

sentences.english: After that, people call on their relatives, friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 在那之后，人们给亲戚，朋友和邻居拜年。

sentences.english: Think about what are people willing to pay for, says Ms. Dunningham.
sentences.chinese: “想想人们愿意出钱做的工作，”坎宁安说。“

sentences.english: He gave all these people these bad rules.
sentences.chinese: 他给人们下达邪恶的指令。

sentences.english: People seem to sense who is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 人们似乎凭感觉就知道谁拥有权力。

sentences.english: The audiences enjoyed the moon and the lanterns while solving the riddles in a relaxed way.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜人们将谜条张贴在各种花灯之上，赏月猜谜。

sentences.english: It is believed that the sperm whale dives deeper than any other cetacean.
sentences.chinese: 人们相信，抹香鲸比其他鲸类动物潜得更深。

sentences.english: They say you should never judge a book by its cover.
sentences.chinese: 人们说以貌取人是不对的。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人们的水晶鞋梦，凯特却颠覆了这种观念。

sentences.english: Serendipitous people are more fearless about trying something new.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔人们会更加勇于尝试新鲜事物。

sentences.english: The lacquered screen that tells the history of a clan of scholars?
sentences.chinese: 能告诉人们一派雅士传奇的漆质屏风？

sentences.english: The most commonly asked question concerning cellulite is how to get rid of it.
sentences.chinese: 关于瘦身，人们最常问到的问题就是如何消除脂肪。

sentences.english: But people are always coming late to operas .
sentences.chinese: 不过人们总是很迟才来看歌剧。
这种分类方式能帮助人们节省在图书馆找资料的时间。

sentences.english: This announcement will arouse a feeling of anger among freedom-loving people.
sentences.chinese: 这一宣告将会激起爱好自由人们的愤怒。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
proletariat/abbr. for 普羅列塔利亞|普罗列塔利亚[pu3 luo2 lie4 ta3 li4 ya4] plus masses/also written 無產階級|无产阶级[wu2 chan3 jie1 ji2] in PRC Marxist theory
someone/people/anyone/there is someone there/occupied (as in restroom)
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
